dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and facts to develop a logical solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their decision-making.

dimensions.label: Attitude Towards Failure
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle failure?

options.description: Your FarTwin will bounce back from setbacks with determination and grit.
Your FarTwin may become discouraged or lose motivation after experiencing failure.

dimensions.label: Teamwork Ability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin contribute to a team?

options.description: Your FarTwin will work harmoniously with others, contributing their strengths and ideas.
Your FarTwin may prioritize individual achievements over team success.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin learns best through images, diagrams, and visual aids.
Your FarTwin absorbs knowledge more effectively through listening and discussion.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking Tendency
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons before taking a risk.
Your FarTwin is likely to take bold action, even if it means facing uncertainty.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin may approach conflict with assertiveness and a desire to 'win' the argument.
Your FarTwin will prioritize understanding and compromise, seeking to find a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Time Management Priority
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin values timeliness and strives to meet deadlines.
Your FarTwin may prioritize flexibility over strict schedules, allowing for more spontaneity.
